items.typeLine: Dabbler's Gold Flask of the Order
explicitMods: 31% reduced Duration
25% increased effect
craftedMods: 30% increased Rarity of Items found during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Sentari's Answer
explicitMods: 10% Chance to Block Spell Damage
+23 to Intelligence
7% increased Quantity of Items found
+5% Chance to Block
Curse Enemies with Punishment when you Block their Melee Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Temporal Chains when you Block their Projectile Attack Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness when you Block their Spell Damage, ignoring Curse Limit
flavourText: Open your eyes and you will see the cracks in your enemy's walls.
Open your mind and you will see the cracks in your enemy's plans.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants extra cold damage based on physical damage to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +2 metres to radius
You and nearby allies gain 26% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage
You and nearby allies deal 19% more Cold Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casts an aura that grants elemental resistances and elemental ailment immunity to you and your allies.
explicitMods: +1.9 metres to radius
40% increased Area of Effect
You and nearby allies gain +34% to all Elemental Resistances
You and nearby allies are Immune to all Elemental Ailments
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 15% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 13% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect

30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

To quench the thirst of those

items.name: Goldwyrm
enchantMods: 16% increased Attack and Cast Speed if you've Killed Recently
explicitMods: 60% increased Mana Regeneration Rate
15% increased Quantity of Items found
+40% to Fire Resistance
10% increased Movement Speed
flavourText: The wyrm draws warmth from the fires of desire.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Adds a buff that deals Physical Damage over time, while increasing Attack Speed and Life Leech. Killing an enemy while this buff is active refreshes the buff duration, and can grant a Frenzy Charge.
explicitMods: Base duration is 10.80 seconds
Grants 20% increased Attack Speed
1.2% of Attack Physical Damage Leeched as Life
You take 4% of your Maximum Life per second as Physical Damage
You take 4% of your Maximum Energy Shield per second as Physical Damage
25% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge on Kill
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

explicitMods: Marked Enemy takes 5% increased Damage
21% reduced Effect of Marks from Supported Skills
Trigger Supported Skill when you Hit a Rare or Unique Enemy with an Attack
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: This Gem gains 100% increased Experience
+24% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses a single enemy, increasing the damage they take from projectiles, and making projectiles split when hitting them, to hit other targets around them. You can only have one Mark at a time.
explicitMods: Cursed enemies take 40% increased Damage from Projectile Hits
Projectiles which Hit Cursed Enemies Split towards 4 additional targets
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.
